short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add product url and keywords with it to track the rank

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daraz Rank Finder is designed to help sellers effortlessly monitor the rank of their products on Daraz. By simply adding the product URL and associated keywords, users can track their product's rank daily. This extension provides accurate and up-to-date ranking information, making it easy for sellers to stay on top of their product's performance without any hassle.

Key Features:
   Easy-to-use interface for adding product URLs and keywords
   Daily tracking of product ranks
   Accurate and reliable ranking data
   User-friendly and efficient, saving time and effort

I created this extension to simplify the process of rank tracking, ensuring you have the insights you need to succeed on Daraz.
